mapper.select: select o.id order_id,p.show_name,o.sequence_number,concat(o.create_time,'') create_time -- ,item_snapshot.item_name,item_snapshot.normal_quantity,item_snapshot.normal_price ,o.total_price,o.status from life_order.order_entry o inner join life_passport.passport p on p.id=o.shipping_passport_id -- inner join life_order.order_item_snapshot item_snapshot on item_snapshot.order_id=o.id where o.shipping_passport_id=#{merchantPassportId} and o.type in(4,9) and o.status =8 order by o.create_time desc

select ifnull(a.todayTotalAmount,0) todayTotalAmount,ifnull(b.monthTotalAmount,0) monthTotalAmount from (select sum(x.total_price-x.total_price*x.rate) todayTotalAmount from ( select t.total_price,t.trans_type ,case t.trans_type when 'CASH' then 0 when 'WEIXIN_NATIVE' then if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) when 'ALIPAY' then if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) else 0 end rate from life_order.order_entry t inner join ( select t.is_need,t.commission_rate from pos_merchant_rate t where t.passport_id=#{passportId} union select 1,0.0038 limit 1 ) b on 1=1 where t.shipping_passport_id=#{passportId} and t.type in(4,9) and t.status =8 and t.payment_time >=curdate() ) x ) a inner join (select sum(x.total_price-x.total_price*x.rate) monthTotalAmount from ( select t.total_price,t.trans_type ,case t.trans_type when 'CASH' then 0 when 'WEIXIN_NATIVE' then if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) when 'ALIPAY' then if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) else 0 end rate from life_order.order_entry t inner join ( select t.is_need,t.commission_rate from pos_merchant_rate t where t.passport_id=#{passportId} union select 1,0.0038 limit 1 ) b on 1=1 where t.shipping_passport_id=#{passportId} and t.type in(4,9) and t.status =8 and date_format(t.payment_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') ) x ) b on 1=1

select a.time,count(a.time) count,sum(a.real_amount) totalAmount from ( select x.*,x.amount-x.amount*x.rate real_amount from ( select date_format(t.payment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') time ,b.commission_rate,t.total_price amount ,t.trans_type ,case t.trans_type when 'CASH' then 0 when 'WEIXIN_NATIVE' then if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) when 'ALIPAY' then if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) else 0 end rate from life_order.order_entry t inner join ( select t.is_need,t.commission_rate from pos_merchant_rate t where t.passport_id=#{passportId} union select 1,0.0038 limit 1 ) b on 1=1 where t.shipping_passport_id=#{passportId} and t.type in(4,9) and t.status = 8 and date_format(t.payment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{beginDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') ) x ) a group by a.time order by a.time desc

select a.*,a.total_price-a.total_price*a.rate amount from ( select t.id,date_format(t.payment_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') time,sequence_number transSequence ,t.total_price,t.trans_type transType,ps.real_name realName ,case t.trans_type when 'CASH' then 0 when 'WEIXIN_NATIVE' then if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) when 'ALIPAY' then if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) else 0 end rate ,t.payment_type paymentType from life_order.order_entry t inner join life_passport.passport ps on ps.id=t.partner_user_id inner join ( select t.is_need,t.commission_rate from pos_merchant_rate t where t.passport_id=#{passportId} union select 1,0.0038 limit 1 ) b on 1=1 where t.shipping_passport_id=#{passportId} and t.type in(4,9) and t.status =8
and date_format(t.payment_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(t.payment_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m')
) a order by a.time desc
